resources.string: Please note that The Witcher Tabletop RPG\'s rules and mechanics differ from traditional Dungeons and Dragons. Use of The Witcher Tabletop RPG Core Rulebook is strongly recommended as this application does not contain all of the necessary information to learn how to play. This is an unofficial application and is not approved/endorsed by CD PROJEKT RED or R. Talsorian Games. This application is not a licensed product. I do not claim ownership of any information, icon, or image used throughout the app. Copyrights and/or trademarks of any information, icon, and/or image used belong to their respective owners.
